Time-Sensitive Logic.Play Function: Requires that the block number in timestamps[msg.sender] is less than the current block number, ensuring play eligibility.

Conditional Logic Paths.Winning Path: If the generated winningNumber meets the difficulty threshold, the player wins.
Conditional Logic Paths.Losing Path: If the winningNumber does not meet the threshold, the player loses.
Conditional Logic Paths.Donation Path: If a user calls donate, funds are transferred directly to the whale address.
